notes: base lemma; plural invariable; colloquial 'euri' sometimes
standard indefinite article before masculine nouns
elided form of il before vowels
plural definite article for masculine nouns starting with a vowel
example_sentence_italian: Gli euro sono usati in Europa.
Mi servono degli euro per il viaggio.
example_sentence_english: I need some euros for the trip.
The value of the euro is high.
I talk about the euros issued.
They have dedicated an article to the euro.
I contributed to the euros collected.
The economy depends on the euro.

example_sentence_italian: Ho ottenuto fondi dagli euro raccolti.
example_sentence_english: I obtained funds from the euros collected.

example_sentence_italian: Nel mercato dell'euro ci sono variazioni.
example_sentence_english: In the euro market there are variations.
In the counted euros there were errors.
I read an article about the euro.

example_sentence_italian: Ho trovato dati sugli euro spesi.
example_sentence_english: I found data about the euros spent.
We travel with euros in cash.
